00038 #ifndef CORELIB_DATAOBJECT_LOCKED_HPP
00039 #define CORELIB_DATAOBJECT_LOCKED_HPP
00040 
00041 
00042 #include "../os/MutexLock.hpp"
00043 #include "DataObjectInterface.hpp"
00044 
00045 namespace RTT
00046 { namespace base {
00047 
00056     template<class T>
00057     class DataObjectLocked
00058         : public DataObjectInterface<T>
00059     {
00060         mutable os::Mutex lock;
00061 
00065         T data;
00066     public:
00072         DataObjectLocked( const T& initial_value = T() )
00073             : data(initial_value) {}
00074 
00078         typedef T DataType;
00079 
00080         virtual void Get( DataType& pull ) const { os::MutexLock locker(lock); pull = data; }
00081 
00082         virtual DataType Get() const { DataType cache;  Get(cache); return cache; }
00083 
00084         virtual void Set( const DataType& push ) { os::MutexLock locker(lock); data = push; }
00085 
00086         virtual void data_sample( const DataType& sample ) {
00087             Set(sample);
00088         }
00089     };
00090 }}
00091 
00092 #endif
00093
